alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:42PM CDT until March 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TENSAS...NORTHEASTERN CATAHOULA AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cooter Point, or 19 miles southeast of Winnsboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Cooter Point around 445 PM CDT. Helena around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sicily Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
